title: Poster, "Cloud Hands, Center for Tai Chi Ch'uan", 20th century
signed: Signed in black ink, lower right: SX
description: Poster depicts red silhouette of a man on a black background with writing: Tai Chi Ch'uan/ Instructors: /Tem Horwitz and Susan Kimmelman are / co-directors of Cloud Hands, founders of / MoMing, and co-authors of Tai Chi / Ch’uan: The Technique of Power.; next column: Term: January 22-April 28 (14 weeks) / Schedule of Tai Chi: Part I (Beginning) / M 6-7:30 W 6-7:30 Fri 6-7:30 / (Choose any 2 classes) / Part II / Tu 6-7:30 Th 6-7:30 / Part III / Sat 10-12 / Review / Tu 6-7:30 / Fees: / Part I $120 / Part II $100 / Part III & Review $100 / Review $50 / Trial Class $3 / Enroll at first class session. Below: Cloud Hands / 9 W. Hubbard, Chicago, Illinois 60610 / 312 644-8087 & 348-0010. Chinese characters in white center left.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Cloud Hands, Center for Tai Chi Ch'uan", 20th century.Offset lithograph on paper. Gift of Various Donors. 1981-29-73.
